hero.title: A step-by-step training structure tailored to your time and fitness level
hero.description: The program is based on modern Western research and principles of sports physiology and contains everything you need for your maximum progress.

secondProgram.description: Follow me on Instagram to see my fitness journey, strong physique, daily workouts, and healthy lifestyle. I also share my everyday life, motivation, and personal moments. Stay connected and get inspired every day.
secondProgram.tgDesc: Contact me on Telegram for questions, collaborations, or any suggestions. I'm always open to communication and happy to connect with you directly.
